attributes.action: Harsher sentencing guidelines for rapists & for crimes against children.
attributes.additional_details: Children lack the ability to protect themselves, thus, they are easy targets for predators who exploit their innocence. The lasting psychological, emotional, and physical damage caused by such crimes can severely impact a child’s development, often leading to long-term struggles with mental health, relationships, and overall well-being. As such, I request that the Government and Parliament collaboratively ensure that they are doing their utmost best to protect vulnerable people.
attributes.background: Take action and raise the sentencing guidelines for crimes against children. A mandatory custodial sentence to be given for even first time offenders.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Review minimum sentences for perpetrators of violence and sexual abuse
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713293

Introduce mandatory life sentences for child sex offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715556
